Classes

Join us for a cooking class and tour of our headquarters where you will learn traditional Nepali dishes and fund training for women in hospitality.

Participate in a craft lesson where you will learn how to create handmade products and learn about fair trade practices.

Join us for a 'Basic Nepali lesson for travelers' led by our literacy teacher Sandhya, and learn all you need to know to start conversing with the locals which will enrich your stay in Nepal.

Get in touch

Seven Women Supporters

Seven Women

Seven Women has socially and economically empowered over 5000 women in Nepal through literacy, skills training and income-generation programs. 

Feel free to send us an email at steph.w@seven-women.com
